title: SOLD: 1887-90 Old Judge N172 - Adrian "Cap" Anson HOF (SGC 50)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1887-90 Old Judge N172 - Adrian "Cap" Anson HOF (SGC 50)
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very clean 1887-90 Old Judge N172 - Adrian "Cap" Anson graded an SGC 50 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
Nice looking card Phil, best of luck in the sale
